name: rollout (itch) (khrob)
description:
This is my entry for GMTK 2022 - Roll of the Dice!

I took it pretty literally. This is really only a tiny proof of concept, but it was fun!

Arrow keys to roll the die, you will roll as many times as the die is showing at the time.

You must land on the magenta square on the final roll to pass the level.

There are only 4 levels, but I'll probably come back and polish more once the jam is complete!
